name: CreateCustomerGroup
description:
Creates a new customer group for a business.

Use this tool to create a new customer group by specifying the group's name. It should be called when a business needs to organize customers into a new group for targeted marketing or management purposes.

parameters.name: customer_group_name
parameters.description: The name of the customer group to be created. It is required for organizing customers into the group.

value_schema.description: The name of the customer group.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique string to ensure the request is processed only once. See [Idempotency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/idempotency).

value_schema.description: The idempotency key for the request. For more information, see [Idempotency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/idempotency).

parameters.name: customer_group_id
parameters.description: A unique Square-generated ID for the customer group. This is automatically generated by Square and is used to identify the customer group.

value_schema.description: A unique Square-generated ID for the customer group.

parameters.name: group_created_timestamp
parameters.description: Specify the timestamp for when the customer group was created, in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: The timestamp when the customer group was created, in RFC 3339 format.

parameters.name: group_last_updated_time
parameters.description: The timestamp when the customer group was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: The timestamp when the customer group was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: The idempotency key for the request. For more information, see [Idempotency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/idempotency).

value_schema.description: The idempotency key for the request. For more information, see [Idempotency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/idempotency).

parameters.name: group.id
parameters.description: A unique Square-generated ID for the customer group.

value_schema.description: A unique Square-generated ID for the customer group.

parameters.name: group.name
parameters.description: The name of the customer group.

value_schema.description: The name of the customer group.

parameters.name: group.created_at
parameters.description: The timestamp when the customer group was created, in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: The timestamp when the customer group was created, in RFC 3339 format.

parameters.name: group.updated_at
parameters.description: The timestamp when the customer group was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: The timestamp when the customer group was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
